languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури — воплощение всех истинных качеств друкари, самых жестоких и смертоносных из рода эльдаров. Им движет неутолимая жажда насилия и власти над другими, которых он добивается изощренным коварством, сомнительными сделками и — к своему великому удовольствию — кровавыми расправами и мучительными пытками своих врагов. Судьбоносная встреча с Вольным Торговцем меняет его судьбу навсегда: лишившись всего, что когда-то принадлежало ему по праву, бывший дракон и изгнанник Комморры теперь вынужден заключить альянс с одним из "мон-кай", чтобы выжить... и, возможно, найти новый способ возвыситься.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.
languages.original_text: Маражай Эзирраеш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури — воплощение всех истинных качеств друкари, самых жестоких и смертоносных из рода эльдаров. Им движет неутолимая жажда насилия и власти над другими, которых он добивается изощренным коварством, сомнительными сделками и — к своему великому удовольствию — кровавыми расправами и мучительными пытками своих врагов. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

languages.text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，拥有黑暗灵族一切最典型的品质。黑暗灵族是艾达灵族之中最残忍、最致命的分支，而玛拉斋也无法抑制对暴力的热爱，渴求获得支配他人的权力。他会通过狡猾的计谋、可疑的暗箱操作，以及他最热衷的屠杀与折磨来实现目标。然而，与行商浪人的命运邂逅却永远改变了他的命运，他失去了曾经拥有的一切。这位曾经的裁决官，如今沦为了科摩罗的流亡者，被迫与“猴子”结盟以求生存……不过，或许他能找到方法东山再起。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，拥有黑暗灵族一切最典型的品质。黑暗灵族是艾达灵族之中最残忍、最致命的分支，而玛拉斋也无法抑制对暴力的热爱，渴求获得支配他人的权力。他会通过狡猾的计谋、可疑的暗箱操作，以及他最热衷的屠杀与折磨来实现目标。然而，与行商浪人的命运邂逅却永远改变了他的命运，他失去了曾经拥有的一切。这位曾经的裁决官，如今沦为了科摩罗的流亡者，被迫与“猴子”结盟以求生存……不过，或许他能找到方法东山再起。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, es la personificación de las características que definen a los Drukhari, los más mortíferos y brutales de los Aeldari. Le impulsa una sed insaciable de violencia y poder sobre los demás, meta que alcanza mediante astucia, tratos dudosos y, para gran alegría suya, mediante la masacre y la tortura de sus enemigos. Un encuentro fatídico con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente cambia su destino por completo. Despojado de todo lo que le pertenecía por su derecho, el Dracón caído se convierte en exiliado de Commorragh y debe aliarse con un{mf||a} «mon-keigh» para sobrevivir... y posiblemente para encontrar el modo de resurgir.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

Un encuentro fatídico con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente cambia su destino por completo. languages.text: リーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のドラコンであるマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、アエルダリの支族の中でも最も残忍かつ凶暴なデュカーリの真の資質を完全に体現している。彼は暴力と、他者を支配するための力への抑えがたき渇望に駆られており、それは狡猾さや怪しげな取引、そして…彼の大きな喜びである、敵の虐殺と拷問によって成し遂げられるのだ。自由開拓者との運命的が出会いが、彼の命運を永遠に変えることとなる。一度はすべてを奪われた元ドラコンにしてコモラフを追放されし者は、生き残るために、”モン＝ケイ”のひとりとの同盟を余儀なくされる…あるいは、それが再起のための新たな道なのかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

traits.locale_text: リーヴィング・テンペストの陰謀団のドラコンであるマラズハイ・アエジレシュは、アエルダリの支族の中でも最も残忍かつ凶暴なデュカーリの真の資質を完全に体現している。彼は暴力と、他者を支配するための力への抑えがたき渇望に駆られており、それは狡猾さや怪しげな取引、そして…彼の大きな喜びである、敵の虐殺と拷問によって成し遂げられるのだ。自由開拓者との運命的が出会いが、彼の命運を永遠に変えることとなる。一度はすべてを奪われた元ドラコンにしてコモラフを追放されし者は、生き残るために、”モン＝ケイ”のひとりとの同盟を余儀なくされる…あるいは、それが再起のための新たな道なのかもしれない。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, incarne à lui seul toutes les qualités des Drukharis, les plus violents et les plus meurtriers des Aeldaris. Il est animé par une soif insatiable de violence et de domination, qu'il étanche en conjuguant ruses subtiles, arrangements équivoques, carnages sanglants et, pour son plus grand plaisir, tortures insoutenables. Cependant, son destin a été à jamais bouleversé par sa rencontre avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} : dépossédé de tout ce qui lui revenait de droit, l'ancien dracon exilé de Commorragh est maintenant obligé de s'allier à l'{mf|un|une} de ces « mon-keigh » pour survivre... et peut-être trouver un moyen de reprendre sa place parmi les siens.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, incarne à lui seul toutes les qualités des Drukharis, les plus violents et les plus meurtriers des Aeldaris. Il est animé par une soif insatiable de violence et de domination, qu'il étanche en conjuguant ruses subtiles, arrangements équivoques, carnages sanglants et, pour son plus grand plaisir, tortures insoutenables. Cependant, son destin a été à jamais bouleversé par sa rencontre avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} : dépossédé de tout ce qui lui revenait de droit, l'ancien dracon exilé de Commorragh est maintenant obligé de s'allier à l'{mf|un|une} de ces « mon-keigh » pour survivre... et peut-être trouver un moyen de reprendre sa place parmi les siens.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms, ist die Verkörperung all der wahren Eigenschaften der Drukhari, des brutalsten und tödlichsten Zweigs der Aeldari. Er wird getrieben von einer unersättlichen Gier nach Gewalt und Macht über andere – beides erreicht er durch subtile Raffinesse, zwielichtige Abmachungen und – zu seiner großen Freude – Folter und Mord an seinen Feinden. Eine schicksalhafte Begegnung mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} ändert sein Schicksal für immer: Ihm wird alles genommen, was ihm einst rechtmäßig zustand, und der ehemalige Dracon wird aus Commorragh verstoßen. Er ist gezwungen, sich mit einem "Chem-Pan-Sey" zu verbünden, um zu überlegen ... und vielleicht einen Weg zu finden, sich wieder zu erheben.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.

Er wird getrieben von einer unersättlichen Gier nach Gewalt und Macht über andere – beides erreicht er durch subtile Raffinesse, zwielichtige Abmachungen und – zu seiner großen Freude – Folter und Mord an seinen Feinden. languages.text: Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı Drakonu Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Aeldarilerin en acımasız ve ölümcül kolu olan Drukhariler ile özdeşleştirilen her bir niteliğin vücut bulmuş hâlidir. Dinmek bilmeyen bir şiddet ve başkaları üzerinde güç sahibi olma açlığıyla yanıp tutuşur. Sonrasında bu açlığı; ince kurnazlıklarla, şaibeli anlaşmalarla ve düşmanlarına büyük bir zevkle işkence edip onları katlederek dindirdir. Marazhai, Hür Tüccar ile karşılaştıktan sonra kaderi tamamen değişti. Bir zamanlar hakkı olan her şey elinden alınan eski Drakon ve Commorragh sürgünü, hayatta kalmak ve yeniden yükselmenin bir yolunu bulmak için bir "mon-keigh" ile ittifak yapmak zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, is the embodiment of all the true qualities of the Drukhari, the most brutal and deadly branch of the Aeldari. He is driven by an unquenchable thirst for violence and power over others, which he achieves through subtle cunning, dubious deals, and — to his great delight — the slaughter and torture of his enemies. A fateful encounter with the Rogue Trader changes his fate forever: stripped of everything that once was his by right, the former Dracon and exile of Commorragh is now forced to ally with one of the "mon-keigh" to survive... and perhaps to find a new way to rise again.
